name: Neuralyzer
description: Send Either all of the cards on your side of the field to the graveyard, or send all of the cards on your opponent’s side of the field to the graveyard.
flavourText: Wait a minute. You just flash that thing, it erases her memory, and you just make up a new one?

name: Print Master
description: Gain +5 Recognition, Gain +5 Work Ethic, Gain +5 Confidence
flavourText: No paper jam stands a chance against me.

name: Office Quiz Showdown
description: Whomever has the higher intelligence level. Winner gains +20 Recognition.
flavourText: Put your knowledge to the test.

name: Office Showdown
description: Battle for the bonus : Compare work ethic, social skills, and confidence. Winner gains +15 Recognition and +10 Work Ethic. If you lose, lose -10 Recognition and -5 Work Ethic.

name: Avoid Ian
description: If confidence is less than 120, Ian reduces -20 work ethic and +20 stress. If confidence is higher, escape and gain +5 in all stats and reduce stress by 10.
flavourText: Ian seems nice, until you talk to him for more than 5 minutes.

name: Yoga Session
description: -20 stress, +5 boost to social skills, confidence, intelligence, work ethic
flavourText: Find your inner peace and productivity.

name: Fake Flu
description: Call in sick, -10 Work Ethic, -5 Recognition, -20 Stress, +5 Other Skills
flavourText: Sometimes a mental health day is just what you need.

name: Sick Leave
flavourText: I don’t know if I laugh or cry, but it’s good to be away from the job for a while…!

name: All emails are answered!
description: Gain +15 Recognition, Gain +10 Social Skills, Gain +10 Stress.
flavourText: Well done! You answered all your emails and are on top of your job!

name: Duvet Day
description: -5 Recognition -40 Stress +20 Confidence, +10 Creativty, +10 Social Skills
